item.description:
*UPDATE*  Unfortunately, it turns out I will not be able to attend the con, but I can still meet up with you guys for lunch that Saturday.  We can meet in the food court of the Prudential right in front of the flower seller.

Calling all Anime fans! Anime Boston, the largest anime convention in New England, is April 6-8. If it's too late for you to get into Pax East and you're craving to attend a geeky social function, this is the con for you! Details on registration rates can be found here: http://www.animeboston.com/registration/index
item.name: Anime Boston
